name: Scott P. Robertson
content: Professor Scott Robertson at the University of Hawaii Scott Robertson Professor Information and Computer Sciences Department University of Hawai‘i at Mānoa Pacific Ocean Science and Technology Building 1680 East-West Road Honolulu, Hawaii 96822 USA Office: POST 314H E-mail: Currently serving as: Program Director, Human-Centered Computing U.S. National Science Foundation 2415 Eisenhower Ave. Alexandria, VA 22314 Contact: +1 703-292-2971 Research Areas Sociotechnical systems Human-computer interaction Social media and civic engagement Digital government (e-Participation) AI and computer science education Publication Links ACM Digital Library dblp Google Scholar ORCID Other Links Curriculum Vita (pdf) Personal site IMDb ACM Digital Library Research Word Cloud
